name: In re Petition of Ross CIOPPA to Challenge and Strike the Nomination Petitions of Peter W. Zentner, Marilyn J. Stevens and Richard W. Masten. Appeal of Peter W. ZENTNER, Marilyn J. Stevens and Richard W. Masten

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, LARSEN, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
parties: In re Petition of Ross CIOPPA to Challenge and Strike the Nomination Petitions of Peter W. Zentner, Marilyn J. Stevens and Richard W. Masten. Appeal of Peter W. ZENTNER, Marilyn J. Stevens and Richard W. Masten.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order of Commonwealth Court reversed. Opinion to follow.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Jay H. Spiegel, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
590 A.2d 752
In re Petition of Ross CIOPPA to Challenge and Strike the Nomination Petitions of Peter W. Zentner, Marilyn J. Stevens and Richard W. Masten. Appeal of Peter W. ZENTNER, Marilyn J. Stevens and Richard W. Masten.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 6, 1991.
Decided May 10, 1991.
Sanford Kelson, Pittsburgh, for appellants.
Jay H. Spiegel, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, LARSEN, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
